Contributor.Organization: Vaccine Research Institute of San Diego

Platform.Title: STv7bEws_MMCC
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: custom made Salmonella PCR product array

Sample.Title: RR2_CRHydplushydrogen02_Cy5_ch1_CRHyd02_Cy3_ch2_7DE13915128

Channel.Source: Transcription profile from 14028s grown anaerobically to log phase in CRHyd in presence of 20% hydrogen, replicate 2
Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. 14028S
Channel.Characteristics: anaerobically to log phase after presence of 20% hydrogen for 15 min
Channel.Extract-Protocol: After immediate treatment with 0.15 volumes of ethanol: phenol (95 %: 5 % vol/vol) cells were pelleted, resuspended in lysis buffer (10 mM Tris, 1 mM EDTA, 0.5 mg/ml lysozyme) and treated with 1 ml of 10 % SDS for 2 min at 64°C. The suspensions were treated with sodium acetate, pH 5.2, then nucleic acids were phenol/chloroform extracted and subsequently precipitated with 0.1 vol 3M sodium acetate and 1.0 vol of cold isopropanol. Finally, DNAse treatment at 37°C for 30min degraded present DNA, leaving clean ribonucleic acid after a second round of phenol/chloroform extraction and precipitation.
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: Standard labeling using Cy5-dUTP with reverse transcriptase and random hexamers

Channel.Source: Transcription profile from 14028s grown anaerobically to log phase in CRHyd without hydrogen, replicate 2
Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. 14028S
Channel.Characteristics: anaerobically to log phase without hydrogen
Channel.Extract-Protocol: After immediate treatment with 0.15 volumes of ethanol: phenol (95 %: 5 % vol/vol) cells were pelleted, resuspended in lysis buffer (10 mM Tris, 1 mM EDTA, 0.5 mg/ml lysozyme) and treated with 1 ml of 10 % SDS for 2 min at 64°C. The suspensions were treated with sodium acetate, pH 5.2, then nucleic acids were phenol/chloroform extracted and subsequently precipitated with 0.1 vol 3M sodium acetate and 1.0 vol of cold isopropanol. Finally, DNAse treatment at 37°C for 30min degraded present DNA, leaving clean ribonucleic acid after a second round of phenol/chloroform extraction and precipitation.
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: Standard labeling using Cy3-dUTP with reverse transcriptase and random hexamers

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: overnight hyb on Corning UltraGAPS slides at 42°C in 25% formamide / 5xSSC / 0.1% BSA
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Perkin Elmer ScanArray 5000 scanner, image acquisition with ScanArray Express 3.0.1 software, spot quantification using Quantarray 3.0 software, adaptive quantification, protocol STv5_SP040504_adapforsmallpins_040817
Sample.Description: biological replicate, Date of Scan Thu Jun 24 15:26:59 2010
Sample.Data-Processing: normalized based on total signal for each channel, background subtracted VALUE data obtained from log of normalized background subtracted ch1/ch2 signal.

Column.Name: CH1_SIGNAL_NOISE_RATIO_FILTER
Column.Description: Channel 1 signal to noise ratio filter

Column.Name: CH2_SIGNAL_NOISE_RATIO_FILTER
Column.Description: Channel 2 signal to noise ratio filter

Column.Name: PRE-VALUE
Column.Description: ch1 % of total / ch2 % of total

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: log of ch1 % of total / ch2 % of total

Series.Title: Transcriptional profiles of anaerobically grown Typhimurium 14028 with and without hydrogen in CRHyd
Series.Summary: Transcripts of 14028 grown to OD0.4 in anaerobic CRHyd medium subsequently supplemented with hydrogen to 20% for 15min, compared to those grown without hydrogen supplementation
Series.Overall-Design: Three biological replicates, dye swapped (i.e. 6 arrays)
